# EU VAT Info

> The most up-to-date source for VAT rates, calculators, and history for all 27 European Union countries.

## Core Tools
* [VAT Calculator](https://eu-vat.info/vat-calculator): Calculate VAT amounts (inclusive/exclusive) for any EU country.
* [VAT Map](https://eu-vat.info/vat-map): Interactive heatmap of standard VAT rates across Europe.
* [VAT Changelog](https://eu-vat.info/vat-changes): Historical record of VAT rate changes since 2000.

## Data & Resources
* [Full VAT Rates List](https://eu-vat.info/llms-full.txt): Complete list of standard and reduced rates for all countries (Markdown format).
* [Embed Widget](https://eu-vat.info/embed): Information on embedding the VAT calculator.

## Country Specific Pages
* [Austria](https://eu-vat.info/country/austria)
* [Belgium](https://eu-vat.info/country/belgium)
* [Germany](https://eu-vat.info/country/germany)
* [France](https://eu-vat.info/country/france)
* [Lithuania](https://eu-vat.info/country/lithuania)
* ... and all other EU member states.

## API for Agents
* [VAT Context API](https://eu-vat.info/api/llm/vat-rates): JSON endpoint optimized for RAG and LLM context retrieval.
